ERROR.EMAIL: No account exists for this email.

EULA.TITLE: MyBroodMinder.com EULA (End User License Agreement) v1.1
EULA.DESCRIPTION: We ask then you agree to the following statements to use this SaaS beekeeping software:
EULA.POINT_1: I am placing the data that I upload or enter into this service into the Public Domain. As such, mybroodminder.com may use the data, in anonymous form, to share with the general public.
EULA.POINT_2: I understand that mybroodminder.com will use best efforts to not expose any Personally identifiable information (PII) such as my username, password, and postal code, but that mybroodminder.com can not be held responsible for hacking or other methods of data exposure.
EULA.POINT_3: I understand that mybroodminder.com will use best efforts to store and backup all data uploaded or entered into it, but that mybroodminder.com can not be held responsible for data loss.
EULA.POINT_4: I understand that mybroodminder.com is a separate company from other vendors that may integrate their devices into mybroodminder.com, and that mybroodminder.com is not liable for those vendors actions.
EULA.POINT_5: I understand that mybroodminder.com is a place for beekeepers and entomologists to exchange information, and I will conduct myself in a courteous manner at all times. I understand failing to do so may cause my account to be terminated at the sole digression of the staff of mybroodminder.com.

ERROR.DUPLICATE: The email address is already in use by another account.
ERROR.EMAIL: The email address is badly formatted.

WEATHER_INFO.TITLE: WeatherSource Weather
WEATHER_INFO.TEXT: This weather data is coming from WeatherSource. It is based off of the postal code provided on your apiary.

RESOURCES.TITLE: Resources
RESOURCES.SUBTITLE: Here you will find many resources so that you can start contributing to learning more about our bees.
RESOURCES.DESCRIPTION: Thank you for joining the BroodMinder movement where we are learning and sharing information in order to improve our understanding and management of our precious honeybees.
RESOURCES.DESCRIPTION_1: Check out our Spring 2020 updates including 'SwarmMinder' updates for your BroodMinder-T2 devices. Watch the video
RESOURCES.DESCRIPTION_2: Sincere thanks to Google and to WeatherSource.com for their generous support of BroodMinder Citizen Science.

APIARY_PAGE.PREMIUM_EXP: Time range selection for this view available with premium subscription.

TEXT.TITLE: Text
TEXT.DESCRIPTION: This view displays the most recent reading uploaded for every position in every hive.

HIVE.TITLE: Hive
HIVE.DESCRIPTION: This view displays a quick chart view for every hive. Weight display precedence: heaviest value. Humidity and temperature display precedence: 1-Above Lower Brood Box 2-Above Upper Brood Box 3-Under Inner Cover 4-Other 5-Custom (highest value) 6-Outside Hive 7-Scale Under Hive

SUMMARY.TITLE: Summary
SUMMARY.DESCRIPTION: This view displays combined charts by data type. Specifics shown follow the defaults of the hive view, but can be set per hive in the hive settings.
SUMMARY.PREMIUM_EXP: This view available with premium subscription. Example shown below.

BATTERY.ALL: Show all devices in multi-select mode

CONFIRM_INACTIVE_WINDOW.TITLE: Set Hive as Inactive
CONFIRM_INACTIVE_WINDOW.MESSAGE: This ends all device locations in the hive and removes hive from your apiary views. Existing data will remain, however new data will no longer go to this hive. This cannot be undone. Set hive {{name}} to inactive?

You are helping researchers around the world learn about and develop interventions for our precious honeybees and our environment.
BEECOUNTED.EXPIRED: Premium membership elapsed. Data is private only before {{end}}.

PH.INFO:
Share your sensor data with Bee Life association through the European Union Pollinator Hub to improve pollinator policy by leveraging advanced technology and data-driven insights collected by beekepers.

The data being shared:
- all devices in this apiary with their raw measurements.
- a rough location of the apiary based on postal code.

Data is sent daily to BeeLife.

EDIT_SUBS.MONTH_ERROR: Month subscriptions are no longer supported for new purchases. To add tokens, you must cancel your current subscription and create a new Premium Membership.

HUB_EDIT.WARNING_DUP: Hub has credit active until {{date}}. This will be replaced.
HUB_EDIT.WARNING_SINGLE: This is a single device hub token. Only one sensor device can be uploaded with this token.
HUB_EDIT.WARNING_WIFI_TYPE: Wifi hub will be running on a cell hub token.
HUB_EDIT.WARNING_REMOVE: This removes token from hub. Hub will stop uploading data.

O1.MSG: Weak hive or in strong decrease

ALERTS_DESC.REALTIME_SWARM_ALERT: Temperature event calculated by T2 device. Only notified for devices above or below brood boxes using a realtime hub.

201.NAME: Possible heavy rainfall
201.DESCR: Triggered when rainfall exceeds the chosen threshold on the next day.

202.NAME: Possible heavy snowfall
202.DESCR: Triggered when snowfall exceeds the chosen threshold on the next day.

203.NAME: Possible strong wind
203.DESCR: Triggered when the wind exceeds the chosen threshold on the next day.

204.NAME: Possible cold day ahead
204.DESCR: Triggered when an upcoming cold day is detected, i.e. below the specified temperature threshold.

205.NAME: Oxalic acid treatment
205.DESCR: Triggered when the average brood in your hives is below the set threshold. This is an indication that allows you to treat your hives with oxalic acid at the right time.
205.MSG: It's time to treat your hives

206.NAME: Possible hot day ahead
206.DESCR: Triggered when an upcoming hot day is detected, i.e. above the specified temperature threshold.

301.NAME: High internal temperature
301.DESCR: Triggered when the internal temperature exceeds the chosen threshold.

302.NAME: Low internal temperature
302.DESCR: Triggered when the internal temperature is below the chosen threshold.

303.NAME: Significant provision of resources
303.DESCR: Triggered when the incoming weight of the day in the hive exceeds the chosen threshold.
303.MSG: The gain of your bees' stock exceeds {VAL}

305.NAME: Weak brood
305.DESCR: Triggered when the percentage of brood is below the chosen threshold.

306.NAME: High internal humidity
306.DESCR: Triggered when the internal humidity exceeds the chosen threshold.

307.NAME: Low internal humidity
307.DESCR: Triggered when the internal humidity is below the chosen threshold.

311.NAME: Honeydew
311.DESCR: Triggered when the weight contribution to the hive exceeds the chosen threshold during the last week.
311.MSG: Incoming weights during the last week exceeding {VAL}

312.NAME: Weight limit exceeded
312.DESCR: Triggered when the indicated weight threshold is exceeded.
312.MSG: The weight of your hive exceeds {VAL}

321.NAME: Swarm
321.DESCR: Triggered when a potential swarm has occurred (Hub offers more efficiency).

322.NAME: Swarm risk
322.DESCR: Triggered when the risk of swarm is high on one of your hives on the next day.

323.NAME: Adding a super
323.DESCR: Indicate the minimum weight of an empty super.

324.NAME: Removing a super
324.DESCR: Indicate the maximum weight of a full super.

401.NAME: Low battery
401.DESCR: Triggered when the battery level of your sensor is below the selected threshold.

401b.NAME: Low battery
401b.DESCR: Triggered when the battery level of your W sensor is below the selected threshold.

401t.NAME: Low battery
401t.DESCR: Triggered when the battery level of your T sensor is below the selected threshold.

402.NAME: Device disconnect
402.DESCR: Triggered when one of your sensors no longer transmits data (or punctually) during each chosen period. Only works with a Hub.

402t.NAME: Device disconnect
402t.DESCR: Triggered when your T sensor no longer transmits data during the last day.

402w.NAME: Device disconnect
402w.DESCR: Triggered when your W sensor no longer transmits data during the last day.

403b.NAME: Poor signal
403b.DESCR: Triggered when your W sensor transmits little data during the last day.

403t.NAME: Poor signal
403t.DESCR: Triggered when your T sensor transmits little data during the last day.

404.NAME: Weather station stopped
404.DESCR: Triggered when your weather station stops transmitting data. Requires its own weather station.
404.MSG: Data transmission error from your weather station since {DATE}

405.NAME: Stolen hive
405.DESCR: Triggered when the weight of your hive becomes abnormally low.
405.MSG: The weight of your hive is abnormally low

406.NAME: Dead hive
406.DESCR: Our algorithm detects every day if your hive is dead based on various parameters we have set.
406.MSG: Your hive has been detected dead

START.TITLE: New and Improved MyBroodMinder!
START.TEXT: Welcome to the new and improved MyBroodMinder! We have added new features, charts, and data. Learn more here.

HOME.TITLE: Home Page
HOME.TEXT: Visit the home page to view an overview of your active hives and apiaries.

HIVE.TITLE: View a hive
HIVE.TEXT_1: Click on a hive name to view it on a dashboard.
HIVE.TEXT_2: Click on the hive again to remove it.

MULTI.TITLE: Enable Multi-Select
MULTI.TEXT: Click multi-select to display multiple hives at once.

APIARY.TITLE: Click Apiary
APIARY.TEXT: Click an apiary to add or remove its hives from your display.

DASHBOARDS.TITLE: New Views and Visualizations!
DASHBOARDS.TEXT: Click on a dashboard name to view your data in different ways!

NEW.TITLE: Custom Dashboards
NEW.TEXT: Create your own dashboard. Add and arrange charts to suit your needs.

CHART_FILTER.TITLE: Chart Filters
CHART_FILTER.TEXT_2: Click to remove and add data to your chart.

DATE.TITLE: Date Range
DATE.TEXT: Select date range and optionaly show forecast.

CONF.TITLE: Advanced Options
CONF.TEXT: Click configure to view more advanced options.

CONF_ALERT.TITLE: Advanced Alert Options
CONF_ALERT.TEXT: Edit alert settings, email, and frequency.

HIVE_COLOR.TITLE: Customize Hive Color
HIVE_COLOR.TEXT_1: Edit your hive to change the hive color. This is customizable so you can easily view multiple hives on the same dashboard.
HIVE_COLOR.TEXT_2: This can also be done for each of your apiaries to specify the weather color.

END.TITLE: That's All
END.TEXT_1: For more help and information view our documentation.

EMPTY.TEXT_1: Welcome to MyBroodMinder! This is the home page!
EMPTY.TEXT_2: This is a quick view for your hives and apiaries. Hives and apiaries are displayed here if they are active with devices assigned.
EMPTY.TEXT_3: Shared apiaries are not shown here.
EMPTY.TEXT_4: It appears you have nothing fitting this description.
EMPTY.TEXT_LI_1B: on the top left to add hives, apiaries, and devices to your account
EMPTY.TEXT_LI_2: Or download BroodMinder Bees app to manage them too.

BLOCKED.TITLE: Home
BLOCKED.DESCR_HIVES: A quick view of the current state of your hives. Showing notes, alerts, and health stats.
BLOCKED.DESCR_APIARIES: A quick view of the current state of your apiary. Showing notes, alerts, weather, and forecasts

MEMBERSHIP_BLOCKS.DASHBOARD_DATA: This dashboard shows computed data. Your free membership does not include these analytics.
MEMBERSHIP_BLOCKS.CHART_DATA: This chart shows computed data. Your free membership does not include these analytics.
MEMBERSHIP_BLOCKS.DASHBOARD_ADD: Only one custom dashboard is allowed with your free membership
MEMBERSHIP_BLOCKS.UNLOCK: Upgrade your account to unlock this feature
MEMBERSHIP_BLOCKS.HIVE_ADD_FREE: You have {{activeHiveCount}} active hives. Your free membership allows {{hivesAllowed}}.
MEMBERSHIP_BLOCKS.HIVE_ADD: You have {{activeHiveCount}} active hives. Your membership allows {{hivesAllowed}}.
MEMBERSHIP_BLOCKS.HOME_PAGE: This view shows computed data. Your free membership does not include these analytics.
MEMBERSHIP_BLOCKS.DATE_PICKER: Range over 13 months and forecast is not available on a free membership.
MEMBERSHIP_BLOCKS.HUB_DATA: Hub data not uploaded with your free membership
MEMBERSHIP_BLOCKS.THIRDPARTY_DATA: Third party data not uploaded with your free membership
MEMBERSHIP_BLOCKS.MISSING_FEATURE: This feature is not available without a membership.

ACCOUNT_ISSUES.TITLE: Account Issues
ACCOUNT_ISSUES.MESSAGE_PAID: You have {{activeHiveCount}} active hives. Your membership allows {{hivesAllowed}}.
ACCOUNT_ISSUES.MESSAGE_FREE: You are on a free membership. Upgrading allows more hives and features.
ACCOUNT_ISSUES.MESSAGE_COMP: You are on a complimentary membership. You can purchase a membership for more hives.
ACCOUNT_ISSUES.MANAGE_MESSAGE: To add a new hive, you'll need to deactivate {{hivesOver}} of your existing hives. You can still view inactive hives (from the configure page), but not upload any new data.

FRAUDCHECKS.SUBCREATE: Error, cannot purchase subscription at this time. (code: {{errorCode}})

DELETE.TITLE: Delete Observation
DELETE.TEXT: Are you sure you want to delete this observation?

NEW_APIARY.TITLE: Add plants to your apiary?
NEW_APIARY.TEXT: Great! You've created a new apiary. Would you like to add some plants that are important for your bees?

PLANT_CHANGE.TITLE: Make observation for another plant?
PLANT_CHANGE.TEXT: You will lose the current observation. Would you like to continue?

ADD_CONFIGURATION.TITLE: Plant Configuration
ADD_CONFIGURATION.INFO: Not finding a plant? Send us a note at support@broodminder.com to request a new plant.

OBS.TITLE: Add an observation to your plant?
OBS.TEXT: Great! You've created a new plant. Would you like to add an observation to your plant?

DELETE_CONFIGURATION.TITLE: Delete Plant
DELETE_CONFIGURATION.TEXT: Are you sure you want to delete this plant configuration?

HOME_V2.TITLE: Thank you for choosing BroodMinder!
HOME_V2.TOP_MSG: Your dedication to beekeeping drives everything we do. With the right tools, you can gain deeper insights into your bees and care for them more effectively. We hope these solutions help you make informed decisions and support the health of your colonies.
HOME_V2.TXT_1: There's so much you can achieve with BroodMinder!
HOME_V2.TXT_2: Your journey begins with MyBroodMinder and the Bees App.
HOME_V2.TXT_3: New here? Start with our Quick Start Guide
HOME_V2.TXT_4: Experienced user? Explore our videos and online documentation for deeper insights.
HOME_V2.TXT_5: Get started and make the most of your beekeeping data!
